Topic.Title: Coke should have never split stock - too many shares out there to move.

Message.Msg: Most stock splits seem to result in an intial drop, no big deal. Long term investors will reap great returns from this split over time. Just be patient and use dividend reinvestment.

Message.Title: The Paul Ryan/romney plan would hurt our products because people
Message.Msg: after paying for their plan, up to $120 a week, consumers would have nothing left.
